column5: When is the peak of Crappie season on Chemong / Buckhorn ?
i would say the same opener

Hate to sound anal-redundant..but...what/when is the opener?  We get up there early June & the crappie hit crawler harnesses like crazy & wondered when it was "really hot' crappie fishing on Chemong...
Last saturday in April is season opener.  Sinker

Panfish season opens April 25th this year.  When the crappie bite peaks can vary year to year. Depends on the weather, when the ice went out, water temps, etc.  We've had our best days anytime from opener til sometimes as late as mid May. Water temps around the mid to high fifties. Some nice warm spring weather is what seems to get them on the bite.
